titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Yale Club of New York City Photograph Collection
Yale Club of New York City Photograph Collection
titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:13

did.unittitle: Yale Club of New York City photograph collection

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The collection contains photographs and pictures collected by the Yale Club of New York City, including some original artwork.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale Club of New York City

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 48-A (YRG 48-A), Yale pictorial records and collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale Club of New York City Photograph Collection (RU 777). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains photographs and pictures collected by the Yale Club of New York City, including some original artwork.
